Reviews.Title: great phone........so far
Reviews.Author: leweypro
Reviews.Content: Okay so far very happy with this phoneClear screenCase looks good not cheap and flimsy, a very slight bulge on the side near the volume button but you have to look for itVoice calls clearBattery pretty good for an android phone. 24 hours since charging moderate playing with and now its 25%Loud speaker not brilliant, I think on full volume ringing it would blow the speaker so set on 80 but its fineCloses copilot when I try to install it but no other apps with any probs yetAntutu benchmark score is . 5971Not brilliant but v happy with the deviceBought from dracotek took 12 days to get to me in the uk
